mapper.select: select * from sharing where id=#{id} and type='info' order by num desc
select filelink from sharing where id=#{id} and type= 'hosting' order by num desc
mapper.update: update sharing set filename=#{filename}, filesize=#{filesize}, fileaddress=#{fileaddress}, filelink=#{filelink}, hostingnum=null where type=#{type} and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from sharing where id=#{id} and type=#{type}
